```py
>>> power = 40
>>> modulo = 10000
>>> x1 = [(n ** power) % modulo for n in range(8)]
>>> x2 = [(n ** power) % modulo for n in np.arange(8)]
>>> print(x1)
[0, 1, 7776, 8801, 6176, 625, 6576, 4001]  # correct
>>> print(x2)
[0, 1, 7776, 7185, 0, 5969, 4816, 3361]  # incorrect 
```

```py
>>> np.arange(3)
array([0, 1, 2])
>>> np.arange(3.0)
array([ 0.,  1.,  2.])
>>> np.arange(3,7)
array([3, 4, 5, 6])
>>> np.arange(3,7,2)
array([3, 5]) 
```
